revised_title: Henry Norris Russell: A Pioneering Astronomer and Astrophysicist
tldr: Henry Norris Russell was a renowned American astronomer and astrophysicist who made significant contributions to various fields of astronomy. He conducted research on planets, comets, lunar photography, and stellar parallaxes, and played a crucial role in the development of the theory of stellar evolution. Russell also made pioneering contributions to the study of eclipsing variables and binary stars.
